description: This file serves as the main entry point for a React application. It initializes the React DOM, attaches the app component to the DOM element with id 'root', and wraps the App component in React.StrictMode for highlighting potential issues.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering the React component tree.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot().render
methods.description: Renders the provided React elements into the root DOM node.
